title: 6.11 Update Failure
body: I opened my client and it started to patch for 6.11 the other day and gave me a "failure to update. check logs," pop-up. So what i did was just try to close it and reopen it and it did the same thing. Next i tried restarting it and the same thing popped up. After that i tried changing regions , letting it update and then changing back. That worked until I started playing the game. It went well through champ select and all but up until about 5 minutes into the game it started bugging very badly. It bugged to the point of lagging but worse. When i died the timer would stop at 0 and stay there. When i would respawn it wouldnt let me move and nobody else would be on the map anymore besides me and it would put me at level 1 with 0 gold. It would eventually go back to normal but do the same thing again within 3 minutes. So i uninstalled the game and tired reinstalling it and it is still giving me a failure to update. I just pressed retry and it is working but what do I do if it does not work?

replies.body:
If you are consistently getting an Unexpected Error Message (Failure to update) and also experiencing connection issues in-game, both of these strongly indicate some sort of connection issue.  During the patcher process, your patcher needs to connect to the Patcher Servers.  If this connection is interrupted for whatever reason, it'll pop up this error message.  In order to resolve it, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  It has the most common solutions that should resolve this issue.

Give me a heads up if you are still experiencing these same issues!
